mapper.sql: id, user_name, status, create_time, update_time, title, authors, description, organization, image_url, text_url, slide_url, video_url, last_modifier, last_ip
mapper.select: SELECT pro.id as id, pro.user_name as userName, pro.status as status, pro.create_time as createTime, pro.update_time as updateTime, pro.title as title, pro.authors as authors, pro.description as description, pro.organization as organization, pro.image_url as imageUrl, pro.text_url as textUrl, pro.slide_url as slideUrl, pro.video_url as videoUrl, pro.last_modifier as lastModifier, pro.last_ip as lastIp FROM t_project pro LEFT JOIN t_project_user pu ON pro.id=pu.pro_id WHERE pu.user_id=#{useId}
